channel.title: Project iScape
channel.description:
Hey, This Post Is For Me To Tell All You Guys About My New Server Project iScape,
Years Ago I Made A Server Called iScape, Wich Got Stole... Released And Loved ^_^
Well NOW!
Im About 20% Through A New Version Wich Is Going To Have All Working Skills Working NPC Emotes, Drops, Shops, Everything i can Think Of...!! Whats More Awsome About This Server Is The Fact I Dont have the Internet at home and have to go all the way to a public libary to share stuff with yew guys :P
Here Is My TO-DO List, [code] //NEED TO DO FIX SHOPS!! Fix New Weapons/Staffs/Bows... Add All Spells/Ancient Magiks Add Full Cooking Add Interface for Spinning Wheel (Wool, Flax, Sinew, Magic Roots) Fix Agility (make it walk to the end of the obsticle instead of teleport) Add Pest Control [Can't Unless Silab Upgrages Cache To 377 -_-"] Add Range... Make All Packets Load From /Packet_Data/Packet_XXX.java Make Elemental Mind Bars Smithable Make Elemental Mind Items Smithable Fix Some Level Up Interfaces! Find Fletching Emote... Find All Crafting Emotes... --> FIX SECOND CLICK NPCS (DISCONNECTS)!!! Fix NPC Drops
//STARTED Move All Save/Load Stuff From Client.java to SaveGameHandler.java! CLEAN UP ALL FILES!!! Add Full Farming! Add All Weapon Special Attacks! Fix Item.java + item.txt! (add all id's/info for new items) Fix Smelting! (only uss 1 coal...?) Make All Packets Into Java Files... Fix NPC Dialogues Fix Ancient Magiks GFX
//COMPLETED Add Full Soft Leather Crafting [DONE] (Need XP and Emotes, The Interface Interacts To Show If You Can Make Or Not...) Add Full Gem Crafting [DONE] (Need XP And Levels) Add Full Glassblowing Crafting [DONE] (Need XP And Levels) Add Full Crossbow Fletching [DONE] (Need XP And Levels) Add Full Fletching![DONE] (Need XP And Levels) Fix Smelting Bars (Smelts even if player doesnt have right amount of ores) [DONE] (Need XP And Levels) Fix Mining (Mines Even If You Have Full Invent) [DONE] Fix Mining Rocks (Need To Add All The Object x and y ) [DONE] Fix Mining Emotes!! [DONE] (Diffrent Pickaxes Have Different Emotes ^_^") Add Full Mining! [DONE] (Need XP And Levels) Fix Some NPC Emotes [DONE] Make A File To Handle Commands [DONE] Fix Tutorial Island NPC Dialogues [DONE] Add Full Tutorial Island [DONE] Fix Level Up Interfaces (Dont Close When Click To Continue) [DONE] (After 2 Hrs And A Spliff :P)Add Full Smithing Add Full Smelting W/ Interface [DONE] Add Full Mining [DONE] Add Full Woodcut [DONE] (Need XP And Levels) Make it so when a skill reaches 99 you get that skills skill cape [DONE] (Complicated If I Want To Make Each Interface) Relocate All NPC's [DONE] Add Interface Fo When Using Raw Beef On Range, To Make Sinew [DONE] Fix Normal Magic GFX [DONE] [/code]
Here is Some Pics...
Full Smithing W/ Smelting: [IMG]http://i22.photobucket.com/albums/b301/djsammy/Smelting_Interface.png[/img]
Farming 1: [IMG]http://i22.photobucket.com/albums/b301/djsammy/Farming_1.png[/img]
Farming 2: [IMG]http://i22.photobucket.com/albums/b301/djsammy/Farming_2.png[/img]
Fletching W/ Crossbow Fletching + Sinew Making [IMG]http://i22.photobucket.com/albums/b301/djsammy/Fletching_Wood_Interface.png[/img] [IMG]http://i22.photobucket.com/albums/b301/djsammy/Raw_Beef_Interface.png[/img]
Mining W/ Working Emotes: [IMG]http://i22.photobucket.com/albums/b301/djsammy/Mining.png[/img]
Gem Crafting W/ Working Emotes:. [IMG]http://i22.photobucket.com/albums/b301/djsammy/Gem_Crafting_2.png[/img]
Teleport GFX Fix: [IMG]http://i22.photobucket.com/albums/b301/djsammy/Teleport_Graphic.png[/img]
GlassBlowing Crafting W/ Interface + Emotes: [IMG]http://i22.photobucket.com/albums/b301/djsammy/Glass_Blowing.png[/img]
Soon Ill Post More Info But This Is All For Now
Thanks For Reading ;)

item.description:
@zero_fly wrote:

F ya i just said it it dosent mean a thing i know english or else i havent been here look i type english now

Norwegian=Halla
English=Hello
Norwegian=Skjer? Hva driver du med?
English=Whats up? What ya up to?

Look i know english so just shut up

item.title: Project iScape
item.dc:creator: @Ian Ian
item.description:
@Ian wrote:

Hey, This Post Is For Me To Tell All You Guys About My New Server Project iScape,

Years Ago I Made A Server Called iScape, Wich Got Stole… Released And Loved

Well NOW!

Im About 20% Through A New Version Wich Is Going To Have All Working Skills Working NPC Emotes, Drops, Shops, Everything i can Think Of…!!
Whats More Awsome About This Server Is The Fact I Dont have the Internet at home and have to go all the way to a public libary to share stuff with yew guys

Here Is My TO-DO List,

//NEED TO DO
FIX SHOPS!!
Fix New Weapons/Staffs/Bows...

Add Full Farming!

Fix NPC Dialogues
Fix Ancient Magiks GFX


//COMPLETED

Add Full Mining! [DONE]  (Need XP And Levels)
Fix Some NPC Emotes [DONE]
Make A File To Handle Commands [DONE]

Add Full Tutorial Island [DONE]
Fix Level Up Interfaces (Dont Close When Click To Continue) [DONE] (After 2 Hrs And A Spliff :P)Add Full Smithing
Add Full Smelting W/ Interface [DONE]
Add Full Mining [DONE]
Add Full Woodcut [DONE] (Need XP And Levels)
Make it so when a skill reaches 99 you get that skills skill cape [DONE] (Complicated If I Want To Make Each Interface)
